Tadić besan: Sudija nas je uništio, ovo je nemoguće
”Ne razumem”, kaže srpski reprezentativac

05 Nov 2019

Imao je Ajaks sve u svojim rukama, imao je vođstvo od 4:1, ali u tom jednom napadu sve se raspalo. Sudija Đanluka Roki svirao je Kopljanicima dva crvena kartona u jednom napadu (drugi žuti za Dejlija Blinda i Joela Veltmana) i Čelsi se vratio iz mrtvih, dok su Holanđani u poslednjim minutima strepeli i za bod. Kapiten Dušan Tadić ne može da sakrije razočaranje.“Moramo da budemo besni zbog ovoga. Ovo je nemoguće”, počeo je Tadić razgovor sa novinarima posle meča.



Zna i on sigurno da Uefa ne toleriše komentarisanje sudijskih odluka, ali nije mogao da se uzdrži.“Nije moguće da nam bilo ko na ovakav način uništava naše takmičenje. Sve smo držali pod kontrolom. Prosto ne razumem da nam u jednom napadu dosudi dva crvena kartona. Ne razumem”.
Zaista, neviđena situacija.“Da li sam ovo nekada doživeo? Ne, nikada. Moram još da pogledam obe situacije, ali ne mogu da se složim sa dva crvena kartona u jednoj akciji. Posle toga je utakmica dobila sasvim drugačiji tok. Možemo da budemo ponosni na sebe. Fudbal prosto nije moguće igrati sa devetoricom. Imali smo sve u svojim rukama, bili smo mnogo bolji. Trebalo je da pobedimo večeras”, ne može Tadić da sakrije razočaranje.
Razumemo ga.
(FOTO: Reuters)

Tadic angry: The judge destroyed us, this is impossible
"I don't understand," says the Serbian national team player

05 Nov 2019

Ajax had everything in his hands, had a 4-1 lead, but in that one attack it all fell apart. Referee Gianluca Rocky played two red cards to Kopljanin in one attack (another yellow for Daly Blind and Joel Veltman) and Chelsea returned from the dead, while the Dutchmen also scored in the final minutes. Captain Dusan Tadic can't hide his disappointment. "We have to be furious about this. This is impossible, ”Tadic began talking to reporters after the match.



He knows for sure that Uefa does not tolerate commenting on refereeing decisions, but he could not refrain. "It is not possible for anyone to ruin our competition in this way. We kept everything under control. I just don't understand that we get two red cards in one attack. I do not understand".
Indeed, an unprecedented situation. "Have I ever experienced this? No, never. I have yet to look at both situations, but I cannot agree on two red cards in one action. After that the match got a completely different flow. We can be proud of ourselves. Football simply cannot be played with nine. We had everything in our hands, we were much better. We should have won tonight, ”Tadic cannot hide his disappointment.
We understand him.
(PHOTO: Reuters)
